credit_line: Bequest of Emily Coe Stowell from the Coe Collection
title: Sampler
description:
Designs referencing reign of Charles II.  Signed: "Margaret Collier Aged Eight Years."  Alphabet, numbers, monograms, and flowering vines.  Sampler reads: "Children obey your parents in the Lord for this is right." 

Also, "Do not your mind to any show/ Nor let your friend your/ Sorrow know/ For when your friend becomes your foo/ Then all the world your mind shall know."
name: Sampler
